session.confirmCurrent: Clear site data for "{target}"? This will remove cookies and storage for this session.
session.confirmAll: Clear site data for all sessions? This may sign you out of some sites.
session.confirmRemovedSites: Remove site data for {count, plural, one {# session} other {# sessions}} from sites that are no longer in your index?
session.resultNoRemovedSites: No cached data found for removed sites.
session.helpRemovedSites: Sessions for removed sites are cached cookies and storage left over after those sites were removed from your index.

view.name: View
view.newTabPlaceholder: {hasEngine, select, true {Search with {engine} or enter URL…} other {Search or enter URL…}}

history.name: History
history.searchFound: {hasQ, select, true {{count, plural, =0 {No search results for “{q}”} one {Found # search result for “{q}”} other {Found # search results for “{q}”} }} other {{count, plural, =0 {No results} one {Found # result} other {Found # results}}}}
history.dialogMessage: This action permanently deletes all saved history records and cannot be undone.
history.tips: Fuzzy match across titles and URLs. Refine with field filters:

form.name: Name
form.customUA: Or enter a custom User Agent string…

validation.userAgentRequired: Please enter a user agent string.
validation.fixJsonErrors: Please fix the JSON validation errors before saving.

tip.agentWarning: Security warning: Allowing web pages to access the Noi API can be dangerous.

message.dataExistOrDuplicated: All data already exists or is duplicated.
message.deleteSelected: Are you sure you want to delete the selected rows? This action cannot be undone.
message.deleteItem: Are you sure you want to delete this item? This action cannot be undone.
message.deleteFile: Delete this file from disk? This action cannot be undone.
message.removeItem: Remove this item from the list? The file will remain on disk.
message.deleteUseTag: This TAG is currently in use and cannot be deleted.

appQuit.title: Quit Noi now?
appQuit.detail: All windows and tasks will close.

nshQuit.title: Close terminal?
nshQuit.detail: Running tasks will be terminated immediately.

general.name: General
general.lockLocalesTip: Lock the locales folder to prevent automatic updates from modifying language files. Useful for custom translations.

sidebarAnchor.name: Sidebar Anchor
sidebarAnchor.disableWarning: Turning this off hides the floating trigger. Only the Noi shortcut can reopen the sidebar, and shortcut conflicts with websites are common, so disabling is not recommended.

tip.cursorWidth: Only applies when Cursor Style is “Bar”.
tip.scrollback: Number of rows kept in history when the terminal scrolls.

shortcuts.name: Shortcuts
shortcuts.helpText: Press the desired key combination, or type it in (e.g. Ctrl+Shift+X)

promptSync.fileRequired: Please select a file to sync.
promptSync.dragJson: Drag a JSON file or click to browse
promptSync.dragCsv: Drag a CSV file or click to browse

offline.headline: No Internet
tryTips: Check the network cables, modem, or router
Reconnect to Wi-Fi or switch to a different network

network.headline: This Site Can’t Be Reached
network.messageFallback: The site took too long to respond.

messageByCode.ERR_HTTP2_PROTOCOL_ERROR: The connection was interrupted (HTTP/2 protocol error).
messageByCode.ERR_QUIC_PROTOCOL_ERROR: The connection was interrupted (QUIC protocol error).

tryTips: Check whether other sites open; if not, reconnect to the network
Restart the router or toggle airplane mode off/on

suggestions.title: Check server availability
suggestions.detail: If {site} is an internal service, confirm it is online or reachable from the current network.

suggestions.title: Inspect security software
suggestions.detail: Firewall, antivirus, or VPN clients can interrupt requests—temporarily pause these tools and retry.

dns.headline: This Site Can’t Be Reached
dns.message: {hostname}’s IP address could not be found.
dns.messageFallback: The server IP address could not be found.

messageByCode.ERR_NAME_NOT_RESOLVED: {hostname}’s IP address could not be found.
messageByCode.ERR_NAME_NOT_RESOLVED_FALLBACK: The server IP address could not be found.
messageByCode.ERR_DNS_SERVER_FAILED: The DNS server failed to respond.
messageByCode.ERR_DNS_MALFORMED_RESPONSE: The DNS server returned an invalid response.

tryTips: Verify the web address is spelled correctly
Check proxy, firewall, and DNS configuration

suggestions.title: Check the web address
suggestions.detail: Make sure {site} is spelled correctly. If it is, the DNS server might be temporarily unavailable.

suggestions.title: Flush DNS cache
suggestions.detail: Flush the DNS cache and reload (for example, `ipconfig /flushdns` on Windows or `sudo killall -HUP mDNSResponder` on macOS).

ssl.headline: Your Connection Isn’t Private
ssl.headlineSecure: This Site Can’t Provide a Secure Connection
ssl.message: Attackers might attempt to steal information from {hostname} (for example, passwords, messages, or credit cards).
ssl.messageSecure: Noi can’t establish a secure connection to {hostname}.

messageByCode.ERR_SSL_PROTOCOL_ERROR: The site uses an invalid or unsupported SSL protocol.
messageByCode.ERR_SSL_VERSION_OR_CIPHER_MISMATCH: The site uses an unsupported SSL protocol or cipher.
messageByCode.ERR_SSL_PINNED_KEY_NOT_IN_CERT_CHAIN: The certificate chain does not match the pinned key.
messageByCode.ERR_SSL_CLIENT_AUTH_CERT_NEEDED: A client certificate is required to access this site.
messageByCode.ERR_BAD_SSL_CLIENT_AUTH_CERT: The client certificate is invalid or was rejected.
messageByCode.ERR_CERT_COMMON_NAME_INVALID: The certificate is valid for a different address.
messageByCode.ERR_CERT_DATE_INVALID: The certificate has expired or is not yet valid.
messageByCode.ERR_CERT_WEAK_SIGNATURE_ALGORITHM: The certificate uses a weak signature algorithm.
messageByCode.ERR_CERT_WEAK_KEY: The certificate uses a weak key.
messageByCode.ERR_CERT_NON_UNIQUE_NAME: The certificate is shared by multiple sites.

suggestions.title: Check the computer’s date and time
suggestions.detail: An incorrect clock can cause certificate errors.

suggestions.title: Proceed with caution
suggestions.detail: Only continue if you understand the risks and trust the site.

proxy.headline: Proxy Connection Failed
proxy.message: Noi attempted to reach the site through the configured proxy, but the connection did not succeed. This tab is now using a direct connection as a fallback.

messageByCode.ERR_PROXY_CONNECTION_FAILED: The proxy server refused the connection.
messageByCode.ERR_SOCKS_CONNECTION_FAILED: The SOCKS proxy refused the connection.
messageByCode.ERR_PROXY_AUTH_UNSUPPORTED: The proxy authentication method is not supported.
messageByCode.ERR_NO_SUPPORTED_PROXIES: No supported proxies were found for this request.
messageByCode.ERR_PROXY_REQUIRED: A proxy is required to access this site.

tryTips: Confirm the proxy host, port, and authentication settings
Ensure the proxy server is reachable from the current network
If the organization requires the proxy, restore it and reload once it is back online

suggestions.title: Review Noi proxy rules
suggestions.detail: Use Noi settings to confirm the proxy rules and bypass list match this network.

suggestions.title: Retry with proxy later
suggestions.detail: When the proxy becomes available again, reload to switch back from direct mode.

blocked.headline: This Page Has Been Blocked
blocked.message: The request was blocked by an extension or security policy.

messageByCode.ERR_BLOCKED_BY_CLIENT: The request was blocked by a client or extension.
messageByCode.ERR_BLOCKED_BY_RESPONSE: The response was blocked by the site or a policy.
messageByCode.ERR_CLEARTEXT_NOT_PERMITTED: The site requires a secure (HTTPS) connection.
messageByCode.ERR_NETWORK_ACCESS_DENIED: Network access is blocked by policy.

tryTips: Disable extensions or content blockers and reload

suggestions.title: Disable extensions or content blockers
suggestions.detail: Extensions such as ad or tracker blockers might prevent the request—temporarily turn them off and retry.

suggestions.title: Check site policy
suggestions.detail: The response may be blocked by X-Frame-Options or Content Security Policy.

client.headline: This Page Isn’t Working
client.message: The site returned an invalid response.

messageByCode.ERR_EMPTY_RESPONSE: {hostname} sent an invalid or empty response.
messageByCode.ERR_EMPTY_RESPONSE_FALLBACK: The site sent an invalid or empty response.
messageByCode.ERR_FILE_ACCESS_DENIED: Access to the file was denied.
messageByCode.ERR_HTTP_RESPONSE_CODE_FAILURE: The server responded with an error.
messageByCode.ERR_INVALID_RESPONSE: The site sent an invalid response.
messageByCode.ERR_INVALID_CHUNKED_ENCODING: The site sent an invalid response.
messageByCode.ERR_INCOMPLETE_CHUNKED_ENCODING: The site sent an incomplete response.
messageByCode.ERR_CONTENT_LENGTH_MISMATCH: The site sent an invalid response.
messageByCode.ERR_RESPONSE_HEADERS_MULTIPLE_CONTENT_LE: The site sent an invalid response.
messageByCode.ERR_CACHE_MISS: The request needs to be resubmitted.
messageByCode.ERR_DISALLOWED_URL_SCHEME: This URL scheme is not allowed.
messageByCode.ERR_UNKNOWN_URL_SCHEME: This URL scheme is not supported.
messageByCode.ERR_UNSAFE_PORT: This port is blocked for security reasons.
messageByCode.ERR_INVALID_REDIRECT: The site returned an invalid redirect.
messageByCode.ERR_UNSAFE_REDIRECT: The site attempted an unsafe redirect.
messageByCode.ERR_RESPONSE_HEADERS_TOO_BIG: The site returned too much data in response headers.
messageByCode.ERR_METHOD_NOT_SUPPORTED: The request method is not supported.

tryTips: Clear the browser cache or stored site data

suggestions.title: Clear site data
suggestions.detail: Remove cookies and cached files for this site, then reload.

suggestions.title: Report to the site owner
suggestions.detail: If the problem persists, contact the site administrator with the error code shown below.

unknown.headline: This Page Isn’t Working
tryTips: If the issue continues, capture the error code and contact the site administrator or support team
